resource_section: Distribution of occupancy rates by month (Percentage)- 2020
remarks: Dataset contains hotel occupancy rate statistics by month for 2020, showing the occupancy rate percentage for each month. Columns: Month and Occupancy Rate. Data shows occupancy rates declining from January (55.9%) and February (42.3%) to very low rates from April onwards (ranging from 2.1% to 9.7%), clearly reflecting the severe impact of COVID-19 travel restrictions on the tourism industry.
